Package de.mixedfx.network

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageBus.MessageReceiver  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Connection  
    ConnectionInput  
    ConnectionOutput  
    MessageBus
    You can send and receive messages over the network (if established, otherwise nothing will happen) in two ways (in the end it's the same way): By using EventBusExtended.publishAsyncSafe(String, Object) (async) / EventBusExtended.publishSyncSafe(String, Object) (sync) with MessageBus.MESSAGE_SEND [methods must be "public"] or writing a method with the Annotation EventTopicSubscriber subscribing for the topic MessageBus.MESSAGE_RECEIVE and call once AnnotationProcessor.process(Object) By using MessageBus.send(Message) (async) or MessageBus.registerForReceival(MessageReceiver)!
    NetworkConfig  
    NetworkManager
    Builds up a network.
    TCPClient  
    TCPCoordinator  
    TCPServer
